casebody.data:
Dolores FREDERICK, Patricia Hagaman, and Beverly Taylor, Petitioners
v.
ALLEGHENY TOWNSHIP ZONING HEARING BOARD, Huntley & Huntley Energy Exploration, LLC. Allegheny Township John H. Slike and Anne E. Slike, Northmoreland Farms LP, Michael Golembeiwski and Lisa Golembeiwski, John P. Brunner, II, Esq., Jeffrey and Sheila Brunner, Miller Niksic, Joanne Resh, Richard and Patricia Trumble, Michael and Jacalyn Schumaker, Respondents No. 449 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 14, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 14th day of May, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
